name.en: Seminar Presentation on Topics about Molecular Science and Technology II
name.ch: 分子科學與技術書報討論暨演練II

remark.en: MST program. Only students of the MST can take the course. Combined course: PHT073&PHT075.Class time:Saturday 9:00~11:00.  Classroom:R311,IAMS.  The actual class time will be set by the lecturer.
remark.ch: 限中研院國際研究生院MST學程學生修習。與PHT073、PHT075合班上課，六/9:00-11:00，中研院原分所311室。實際上課時間，依任課老師規定。

goal.en: "This course aims at encouraging students to attend as many colloquium talks at the IAMS as possible. The students will gain the up-to-date and breadth of knowledge about contemporary molecular science and technology, as well as being exposed to the excitement and passion toward frontier research, through attending the invited talks delivered by the experts from diverse subfields."
goal.ch: "This course aims at encouraging students to attend as many colloquium talks at the IAMS as possible. The students will gain the up-to-date and breadth of knowledge about contemporary molecular science and technology, as well as being exposed to the excitement and passion toward frontier research, through attending the invited talks delivered by the experts from diverse subfields."

grading.en: "The first-year-student needs to submit a written report on one of the colloquia. It accounts for 100%. The second-year-student, including the 2nd year PhD student and the first-year-student of Direct Pursuit of PhD, needs to submit a written report on one of the colloquia and give an oral presentation on a recently published journal article. Each item accounts for 50%. The third-year-student and beyond needs to give an 30-min oral presentation on a recently published journal article. Each item accounts for 100%."
grading.ch: "The first-year-student needs to submit a written report on one of the colloquia. It accounts for 100%. The second-year-student, including the 2nd year PhD student and the first-year-student of Direct Pursuit of PhD, needs to submit a written report on one of the colloquia and give an oral presentation on a recently published journal article. Each item accounts for 50%. The third-year-student and beyond needs to give an 30-min oral presentation on a recently published journal article. Each item accounts for 100%."

domain.en: 凝態與半導體物理 、 原子與分子物理 、 電漿與強場光學 、 複雜系統，軟物質與生物物理
domain.ch: 凝態與半導體物理 、 原子與分子物理 、 電漿與強場光學 、 複雜系統，軟物質與生物物理

en.competency: Advanced knowledge in the research subfield
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment
